# Code examples

### Create a bot

```js
const ServisBotSdk = require('@servisbot/servisbot-api-sdk');

const url = "<The URL where the API is deployed>";
const apiKey = "<Your API key>";
const Bot = {
  "Workers": {
      "WelcomeWorker": {
          "Type": "welcome-worker",
          "Id": "8kZ1vdOqb"
      }
  },
  "State": "RUNNING",
  "SecureSession": false,
  "QuietTimeEnabled": false,
  "Organization": "engrosscasey",
  "Updated": 1535106050359,
  "Created": 1535104730252,
  "Name": "TalBot2"
}

ServisBotSdk.init(url, apiKey)
  .then(() => {
    return ServisBotSdk.BotArmy.createBot(
      Bot.Name, Bot.State, Bot.TimeZone, Bot.SecureSession, Bot.QuietTimeEnabled, Bot.Workers, {}
    ).then((bot) => {
      console.log(bot);
    })
  })
```

### Update a bot

```js
const ServisBotSdk = require('@servisbot/servisbot-api-sdk');

const url = "<The URL where the API is deployed>";
const apiKey = "<Your API key>";
const Bot = {
  "Workers": {
      "WelcomeWorker": {
          "Type": "welcome-worker",
          "Id": "8kZ1vdOqb"
      }
  },
  "State": "RUNNING",
  "SecureSession": false,
  "QuietTimeEnabled": false,
  "Organization": "engrosscasey",
  "Updated": 1535106050359,
  "Created": 1535104730252,
  "Name": "TalBot2"
}

ServisBotSdk.init(url, apiKey)
  .then(() => {
    return ServisBotSdk.BotArmy.updateBot(
      Bot.Name, Bot.State, Bot.TimeZone, Bot.SecureSession, Bot.QuietTimeEnabled, Bot.Workers, {}
    ).then((bot) => {
      console.log(bot);
    })
  })
```

### Delete a bot

```js
const ServisBotSdk = require('@servisbot/servisbot-api-sdk');

const url = "<The URL where the API is deployed>";
const apiKey = "<Your API key>";
const BotName = "TalBot2";
}

ServisBotSdk.init(url, apiKey)
  .then(() => {
    return ServisBotSdk.BotArmy.deleteBot(
      BotName
    ).then((result) => {
      console.log(result);
    })
  })
```

### Describe a bot

```js
const ServisBotSdk = require('@servisbot/servisbot-api-sdk');

const url = "<The URL where the API is deployed>";
const apiKey = "<Your API key>";
const BotName = "TalBot2";
}

ServisBotSdk.init(url, apiKey)
  .then(() => {
    return ServisBotSdk.BotArmy.describeBot(
      BotName
    ).then((result) => {
      console.log(result);
    })
  })
```

### Start a bot

```js
const ServisBotSdk = require('@servisbot/servisbot-api-sdk');

const url = "<The URL where the API is deployed>";
const apiKey = "<Your API key>";
const BotName = "TalBot2";
}

ServisBotSdk.init(url, apiKey)
  .then(() => {
    return ServisBotSdk.BotArmy.startBot(
      BotName
    ).then((result) => {
      console.log(result);
    })
  })
```


### Pause a bot

```js
const ServisBotSdk = require('@servisbot/servisbot-api-sdk');

const url = "<The URL where the API is deployed>";
const apiKey = "<Your API key>";
const BotName = "TalBot2";
}

ServisBotSdk.init(url, apiKey)
  .then(() => {
    return ServisBotSdk.BotArmy.pauseBot(
      BotName
    ).then((result) => {
      console.log(result);
    })
  })
```


### Stop a bot

```js
const ServisBotSdk = require('@servisbot/servisbot-api-sdk');

const url = "<The URL where the API is deployed>";
const apiKey = "<Your API key>";
const BotName = "TalBot2";
}

ServisBotSdk.init(url, apiKey)
  .then(() => {
    return ServisBotSdk.BotArmy.stopBot(
      BotName
    ).then((result) => {
      console.log(result);
    })
  })
```
